lead_paragraph: The United States Embassy was denied access to an appeal hearing for an American geologist sentenced to eight years in prison for buying a database on China’s oil industry, an American official said.
snippet: The United States Embassy was denied access to an appeal hearing for an American geologist sentenced to eight years in prison for buying a database on China’s oil industry, an American official said.

headline.main: China: U.S. Embassy Blocked From Geologist’s Hearing
headline.print_headline: China: U.S. Embassy Blocked From Geologist’s Hearing
